description:
Robert`s Swoobat helps Robert with his Pokémon photography. With the help of Robert`s Swoobat, Ash and Robert were able to find an Antres flower. They decided to go to where Robert`s Swoobat found the flower but it started to get foggy. Robert is a good guide and is able to track around without getting lost. Robert`s Swoobat used its courting sound waves to befriend a Shikijika. The courting sound waves make the target start feeling happy. Robert always gets his Kokoromori to use them on the Pokémon he wants to take pictures of.
None of Robert`s Swoobat`s moves are known.
name: Kokoromori (Robert)
